page.title: 07School Games
page.content: At school we play different sorts of games from those at home because we have more people at school than at home. At school we play games like netball .In netball you have seven girls in a team. The boys play football you have five boys in a team we play five a side football because we are only a small school and we have small goal posts as well. The juniors play crocker,for this game you put two posts in the middle and one on either side about 5 or 6 metres away the ball is bowled to you and you have to run to one of the posts and back to get a run .Unlike rounders the bowler bowls when he is ready even if the batsman is not back. The juniors play rounders and there are four posts and you hit the ball and then run round the posts to get a rounder but some times you don't
